review: I am thoroughly impressed with the K&M 18810.015.55 Table Style Keyboard Stand. The build quality is outstanding, and it feels incredibly sturdy, which is crucial for my setup. The adjustable height and the ability to accommodate different keyboard sizes are perfect for my needs. Despite its higher price, the stand is well worth the investment due to its durability and reliability. The design is also aesthetically pleasing, and the included velcro straps ensure my keyboard is secure. This stand is a must-have for serious musicians and is definitely a step up from other stands I've used.
